DOC.brief_summary: Exploratory study assess effect three gonadotrophin protocol Controlled Ovarian Stimulation ( COS ) parameter IVF outcome oocyte donor undergo GnRH analogue ( long protocol ) . 1,028 donor randomize three group : Group I ( n= 346 ) r-FSH , Group II ( n= 333 ) HP-hMG Group III ( n= 349 ) r-FSH plus HP-hMG . IVF outcome 1,059 oocyte recipient compare .
